name: pbooks-pro
description: PBooks Pro - Finance and Project Management Application
author: PBooks Pro

scripts.electron: npm run electron:extract-schema && cross-env VITE_ELECTRON_BUILD=true VITE_API_URL=https://api.pbookspro.com/api vite build && electron .
scripts.electron:pack: npm run electron:extract-schema && cross-env VITE_ELECTRON_BUILD=true npm run build && electron-builder --dir
scripts.electron:production: npm run electron:extract-schema && cross-env VITE_ELECTRON_BUILD=true VITE_API_URL=https://api.pbookspro.com/api npm run build && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:production:installer: npm run electron:extract-schema && cross-env VITE_ELECTRON_BUILD=true VITE_API_URL=https://api.pbookspro.com/api npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis
scripts.electron:staging: npm run electron:extract-schema && cross-env VITE_ELECTRON_BUILD=true VITE_API_URL=https://pbookspro-api-staging.onrender.com/api npm run build && electron-builder --win --config electron-builder.staging.json
scripts.electron:staging:installer: npm run electron:extract-schema && cross-env VITE_ELECTRON_BUILD=true VITE_API_URL=https://pbookspro-api-staging.onrender.com/api npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis --config electron-builder.staging.json
